globalAttributes.name: @on
globalAttributes.description:
# @on directive

Declare event handlers on an element.

## Syntax

 A comma separated list of `event_type:event_handler` 

## Examples
```html

<!-- Single handler -->
<button @on="click:handleClick">click me</button>

<!-- Shorthand syntax (handler named click) -->
<button @on="click">click me</button>

<!-- Multiple handlers -->
<button @on="click:handleClick, mouseover:handleMouseOver">click me</button>

```

globalAttributes.name: @use
globalAttributes.description:
# @use directive

Add a lifecyle hook to an element.

## Syntax

 A comma separated list of hooks 
## Example
```html
<input @use="hook1, hook2">
```
